content: आस्फोटः {@--1@} The Arka plant. {@--2@} The sound made by striking on the arms (<ab>Mar.</ab> छड्डू ठोकणें); कर° मिश्रेण <ls>K. 28.</ls> {@--3@} Trembling, quivering. {@--4@} Striking or rubbing against, blow; पुच्छ° <ls>Mv. 5. 63</ls>; लांगूलास्फोटशब्दाच्च चलितः स महागिरिः <ls>Mb.</ls> --टा The नवमल्लिका plant, wild variety of jasmin.
